en.title: About Me
en.intro: I am a passionate developer focused on creating high-performance mobile applications.
en.journey: Junior+ Flutter and Fulâ€‘Stack Developer with hands-on internship experience at Colaba and strong foundations in OOP and clean architecture (MVC/MVVM/MVP). Build performant, maintainable mobile apps in Dart/Flutter with state management (Provider, BLoC), testing and animations, and integrate cloud back ends using Firebase/Supabase with REST/JSON. Bachelorâ€™s student at Turan University eager to contribute to highâ€‘impact projects.
en.servicesSubtitle: Solutions tailored to your digital needs.

services.title: Mobile Apps
services.desc: Developing cross-platform mobile applications with Flutter or Jetpack Compose.

services.title: Web Development
services.desc: Building responsive, high-performance websites using React and Next.js.

services.title: Performance
services.desc: Optimizing applications for maximum speed and efficiency.

experience.desc:
Worked with HTML, CSS, JS, Bootstrap, PHP, SQL, MVC, Documenting code. Analyzed system architecture and source code
Created clear and structured technical documentation
Designed and implemented functionality improvements
Improved UX and maintainability

education.desc: Focused on software engineering, algorithms, web development, C++, C#, Python and Network.
